INTRO_SECTION.TITLE:
Welcome to
Portico Sport
INTRO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Based in Spain, Portico Sport is one of the leading Padel courts & canopies manufacturer globally. The company counts with 15 yrs. track record in the industry, presence in over 40 countries and +3,500 courts installed.

Portico Sport stands for quality and excellence in customer service. Our engineering DNA enable us to be manufacturer with a complete turnkey offering combining courts and canopies with 100% in-house design and manufacturing.

In 2023 the company inaugurated a new manufacturing site expanding over 110k sqft making it the largest and most technologically advanced in the industry.

CANOPIES_SECTION.TITLE: Canopies
CANOPIES_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Strength, durability and perfect integration
CANOPIES_SECTION.TEXT:
Portico Sport is the only padel court manufacturer that also builds canopies specifically designed for racket sports offering our clients a holistic approach to their project needs.

Our expertise as an engineering firm has allowed us to design canopies specifically conceived for sports practice, particularly for PADEL, combining differentiating features for this sport that are hard to match by other types of canopies. PORTICO SPORT is a leader in design and installation of sports canopies worldwide.

POINT_1.TITLE: EXPERIENCE
POINT_1.DESCRIPTION: With over 15 years of experience in managing large projects across five continents, we have developed an international commercial network in each area to provide the best service to every client.

POINT_2.TITLE: INNOVATION
POINT_2.DESCRIPTION: In our commitment to innovation, Portico Sport offers the best design and quality in our courts and canopies, with record delivery times and full warranties. We provide padel courts and canopies with maximum strength and durability.

POINT_3.TITLE: PREMIUM QUALITY
POINT_3.SUBTITLE: Padel courts that comply with regulations
POINT_3.DESCRIPTION: Designed and developed by engineering department of PORTICO SPORT for the practice of padel at the highest level, our courts comply with the official sports regulations (NIDE 2004 Padel), the regulations and standards of the FIP (International Padel Federation) and structural calculation based on the Standard «Structural Steel Instruction (EAE)» and American Code: AISC-360 AND ASCE SEI 7-16-. All our courts come with a 10-year guarantee (structural stability).

POINT_4.TITLE: TEAM - SPORTS ENGINEERING AND ARCHITECTURE
POINT_4.DESCRIPTION: As an engineering firm, Portico Sport provides a comprehensive construction process from start to finish, with a team of specialized professionals who guide you through every step, recognizing that each project is unique.

COURT1.SEO_DESCRIPTION: The mobile court is the first patented mobile court in the market designed and engineered by our Engineering department. This allows sports practice in a specific location for an extended period, making it suitable for permanent use over the years, or it can be easily moved to another location. If you're looking for a court that offers the possibility of mobility, the mobile court is the best choice.
COURT1.NAME: Mobile court
COURT1.SUBTITLE: Introducing the latest innovation in padel court technology
COURT1.TITLE: Mobile court patented by Portico Sport
COURT1.DETAIL_TITLE: Mobile courtpatented by Portico Sport
COURT1.DESCRIPTION:
Our patented Mobile Court, meticulously designed and engineered by our expert Engineering Department, is revolutionizing the market and it was the first of its kind in the padel industry.

This groundbreaking court eliminates the need for costly ground preparation expenses and permit acquisitions. With only a drained surface required to prevent water accumulation, our court offers unparalleled convenience and cost savings.
COURT1.CONTACT_TITLE_1: Do you want a Mobile Court?
COURT1.CONTACT_SUBJECT: New petition for a Mobile Court

FIRST_SECTION.TITLE: Move it anywhere!
FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
What sets our court apart is its innovative counterweight box system, ensuring sturdy support without the need for ground anchoring.

This means you can enjoy sports activities in your desired location for years to come, or effortlessly relocate it whenever needed.

But that’s not all – our court’s special counterweight box system also makes it incredibly resilient, capable of withstanding wind speeds of up to 114.12 km/h.

INFORMATION_SECTION.TITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality court structure
INFORMATION_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Choose convenience, flexibility, and reliability with our Mobile Court
INFORMATION_SECTION.TEXT:
Crafted with galvanized steel painted structure, our court ensures maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation. The court structure consists of HOT DIP GALVANIZED S275 JR steel profiles, attached to the mobile base using countersunk metal anchors. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

Discover the epitome of distinction in padel court construction, choose the color that suits your preference, and elevate your padel experience today.

COURT7.TITLE: Single court
COURT7.DESCRIPTION: Our Single Court is perfect for a solo player and is specially designed by Portico Sport's engineering department. With dimensions smaller than usual (20x6m), this court is intended to provide a great playing experience for those who play alone, whether for training, enjoyment, or due to a lack of a partner for the sport. Despite its smaller size, it features the same premium quality and exceptional durability as the rest of our courts, making it a great choice for clubs looking to expand their offerings and provide this special court.

FIRST_SECTION.TITLE: Sport-Specific Engineering
FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Designed to protect outdoor padel courts from the inclement weather and provide an unparalleled play experience. Weather resistance, transparency, high-quality structure that meets safety and durability standards, and aesthetically pleasing design that seamlessly integrates with the surroundings while also being visually appealing.

FEATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Specialized Professional team
FEATURE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Our engineers develop construction and installation systems for padel court canopies tailored to the needs of our clients, as well as to the standards and regulations of each country.
LIST: Reduced heat projection compared to metal sheets canopies.
Reduced shadows and contrasts compared to opaque materials.
Increased brightness that optimizes the use of artificial lighting.
Reduced echo effect during gameplay.
Prevents discoloration of the turf due to UV rays.
Prevents crystal condensation.
Prevents rain from compacting the sand on the turf.
Soften potential expansions and contractions caused by sunlight on the structure and the turf.
FEATURE_SECTION.LIST_DESCRIPTION: We highlight the following features of our canopies:

ADVANTAGE_SECTION.TITLE: Installation of padel canopies
ADVANTAGE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
PORTICO SPORT has many years of experience in engineering, and handles the entire construction process, with a team of professionals specialized in every step from design to manufacturing and installation.

They are highly aware of the unique nature of each client and manage their projects with the respect and personalized attention that everyone requires. All of this, guarantees the success of their work, based on quality, innovation, trust, and experience.

Manufactured with hot-rolled structural steel profiles of various dimensions as required by the installation.

The roofing of the structure is done with cellular polycarbonate sheets of variable thicknesses as demanded by the project and the situation.

The material provides the roof with ideal characteristics for the practice of this sport, tested by high-level players.

As an option we offer the possibility of installing side panels up to a height of 3 meters from the ground, to prevent lateral winds and/or rains that could interfere with the game.

FACTORY.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Our factory is the largest and most technologically advanced in the industry. We have a new manufacturing site expanding over 110k sqft. Our factory is equipped with the latest technology and machinery, allowing us to manufacture and install padel courts and canopies worldwide.
FACTORY.TITLE: Portico Sport Factory
FACTORY.SUBTITLE: The largest padel courts and canopies manufacturing site
FACTORY.DESCRIPTION:
The company boasts a cutting-edge factory spanning over 8.000 square meters, which integrates state-of-the-art industrial technology, a robotic welding assembly line, and industrial processes previously applied in more advanced industries.

As a result, Portico Sport has increased its production capacity, enhanced quality, modernized its production system, and reduced delivery times worldwide.

FEATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Commitment to excellence
FEATURE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
The manufacturing plant represents an even greater boost to exports to new countries on all five continents. Currently, Portico Sport has presence in over forty countries globally, consolidating its position in large markets such as the United Kingdom, Germany, or the United States, while also actively expanding into emerging markets in the Middle East, Asia and LATAM.

This new factory is one of the largest in the sector and the most technologically advanced, featuring distinct areas for design, production, manufacturing, and lacquering. It provides the entire construction process from start to finish, incorporating innovative solutions for more efficient welding.

This Extremadura-based company combine perfect efficiency with cutting-edge sports technology.

CONTACT_SECTION.TITLE: Visit our factory
CONTACT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We invite you to visit our facilities. Our team of experts will be delighted to guide you through the different design, production, manufacturing and lacquering plants, showing the entire construction process from start to finish. Discover the entire production process from the materials selection process to the cutting-edge engineering that enables us to manufacture the best courts in the industry.

This is a unique opportunity to understand why our courts and canopies are so highly valued by professional players and enthusiasts worldwide, and to gain insight into the manufacturing process of high-quality padel courts and the technology and innovation that boost our industry. Additionally, you'll have the chance to experience the quality of our courts by playing on one of them.

We look forward to seeing you at our facilities and sharing our passion for padel with you.

INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Based in Spain, Portico Sport is one of the leading Padel courts & canopies manufacturer globally. The company counts with 15 yrs. track record in the industry, presence in over 40 countries and +3,500 courts installed.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Portico Sport stands for quality and excellence in customer service. Our engineering DNA enable us to be manufacturer with a complete turnkey offering combining courts and canopies with 100% in-house design and manufacturing.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: In 2023 the company inaugurated a new manufacturing site expanding over 110k sqft making it the largest and most technologically advanced in the industry.
BENTO_CONTENT_1: With over 15 years of experience in managing large projects across five continents, we have developed an international commercial network in each area to provide the best service to every client.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: In our commitment to innovation, Portico Sport offers the best design and quality in our courts and canopies, with record delivery times and full warranties. We provide padel courts and canopies with maximum strength and durability.
BENTO_SUBTITLE_3: Padel courts that comply with regulations
BENTO_CONTENT_3: Designed and developed by engineering department of PORTICO SPORT for the practice of padel at the highest level, our courts comply with the official sports regulations (NIDE 2004 Padel), the regulations and standards of the FIP (International Padel Federation) and structural calculation based on the Standard «Structural Steel Instruction (EAE)» and American Code: AISC-360 AND ASCE SEI 7-16-. All our courts come with a 10-year guarantee (structural stability).
BENTO_CONTENT_4: As an engineering firm, Portico Sport provides a comprehensive construction process from start to finish, with a team of specialized professionals who guide you through every step, recognizing that each project is unique.
PREFOOTER_SUBTITLE: The largest padel courts and canopies manufacturing site
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Don't hesitate to contact our team of experts for more information on padel courts! Additionally, if you'd like, we can also design and build your own customized court according to your preferences and specifications. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

WHAT_IS.TITLE: What are cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cookies are alphanumeric identifiers that contain information that is installed on the User's device and downloaded to the User's Web browser when the User visits and accesses a web page. Their main purpose is to uniquely identify and recognize the User's device each time he or she accesses the Website, as well as to improve the quality and offer a better use of the Website.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: They are small text files that are stored on the hard drive of the computer and serve to identify the User when he or she connects to the website again. Their purpose is to record the User's visit and save certain information. Their use is common and frequent on the web as they allow pages to function more efficiently and obtain greater personalization and analysis of the User's behavior.

TYPES.TITLE: What types of cookies are there?
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1_TITLE: 1.- According to the entity that manages them:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: Own cookies are those that are installed on the User's terminal from the domain managed by the person responsible for the Website and third-party cookies are those that are installed on the User's terminal from a domain managed by third parties that process the data obtained through such cookies.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2_TITLE: 2.- According to the length of time they remain active:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Session cookies are those that remain active and collect data while the user accesses a website and disappear when the session ends, and permanent cookies are those that remain active and from which data is collected for a period of time defined by the person responsible for the cookie or until they are deactivated or deleted by the User.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: They are those that allow the User to navigate through a web page and use the different options or services offered, such as, control traffic and data communication, identify the session, access restricted access parts, make a request for registration, use security elements during navigation, etc. As they are necessary for the operation of the website, these cookies will be activated and cannot be rejected.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: This type of Cookie remembers your preferences in browsing the Web so that you do not have to reconfigure the service each time you visit the Web. By way of example, this type includes: Volume settings for video or sound players. Video transmission speeds that are compatible with your browser. These cookies can be disabled by the User, although this may affect the proper functioning of the Web services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: They are those that allow the tracking and analysis of the behavior of the Users of the Web in order to obtain statistical data and improve the operation of the Web. Each time a User visits a Web, a tool from an external provider generates an analytical cookie on the User's computer.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: This type of cookies allows to obtain information about the duration or frequency of visualization of advertising positions, the interaction with them, or the navigation patterns and/or behaviors of the User since they help to shape an advertising interest profile. In this way, they allow to offer advertising related to the interests of the User.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_7: They are those that allow the User to interact with the content of different social platforms (Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.) and that are generated only for the Users of said social networks. The conditions of use of these cookies and the information collected are regulated by the privacy policy of the corresponding social platform.

BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_1: You can allow, block or delete the cookies installed on your computer by configuring the options of the browser installed on your computer. ELEVATED_PLATFORM.SEO_DESCRIPTION: The elevated platform is a patented system designed and engineered by our Engineering department. This system allows sports practice in a specific location for an extended period, making it suitable for permanent use over the years, or it can be easily moved to another location. If you're looking for a court that offers the possibility of mobility, the elevated platform is the best choice.

ELEVATED_PLATFORM.SUBTITLE: - Leaders in manufacture and installation of padel courts –

FIRST_SECTION.TITLE: Your padel court on any terrain
FIRST_SECTION.SUBTITLE: The perfect solution for you!
FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: At Portico Sport, our engineering team has developed an innovative, elevated, modular and removable platform, specifically designed to adapt to any type of terrain.This platform provides a sturdy and reliable foundation for all our court models, enabling clients to establish their padel space irrespective of terrain conditions. Additionally, clients can save on ground preparation expenses and permit acquisition as only a soil test is necessary to place the platform.

FEATURE_SECTION.TITLE:
Elevate your passion for padel to new heights with
our innovative elevated platform!
FEATURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Remarkable features

IMAGE.alt: Elevate your passion for padel to new heights

LIST: Same structural resistance as our Club court model, capable of withstanding wind speeds of 115 km/h (71.5 mph).
Only a ground report is necessary to place the platform.
Quick and easy assembly.
Structural stability to ensure the best playing experience.
Manufactured with premium steel and components for maximum strength and durability.
Same 10-year warranty as all our padel courts.

IMAGE.alt: Elevated platform patented by Portico Sport

ADVANTAGE_SECTION.TITLE: Great performance
ADVANTAGE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Discover our elevated platform, where versatility and durability come together to offer you an innovative solution in padel court installation. With our adjustable pillar system and unique assembly design, we streamline the process required so you can enjoy your padel court quicker and in a much wider range of different terrains, now the possibilities to where install your padel court are endless!
ADVANTAGE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: The benefits of our innovative elevated platform:
ADVANTAGES: Effortlessly overcomes terrain variations without the need for extensive and costly ground leveling or foundations.
Save valuable time and efforts.
Requires simple testing for placement, ensuring a hassle-free installation process.
Avoids permanent installation pitfalls.
Same 10-year warranty as all our padel courts.

INFORMATION_SECTION.TITLE: A platform designed to overcome any terrain
INFORMATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
The Portico Sport elevated platform is a structural solution that adapts to your terrain. Thanks to its adjustable pillar system, it overcomes the terrain limitations that normal padel courts bring with them without affecting the game experience. Its unique design and screwing system allow for quick and easy installation. This means that in no time, your platform will be ready to accommodate to any unevenness of the ground and facilitate the installation of any of our padel courts.

Our engineering department is at the forefront of the padel courts design and manufacturing industry, which is why each elevated platform undergoes rigorous procedures including seismic analysis, deformation limitation and verification of steel elements according to ASCE 7-SEI 2019 and AISC 360 2016 (LRFD) regulations, guaranteeing safety and quality in every detail to ensure optimal performance and unparalleled stability.

IMAGE.alt: Elevated platform patented by Portico Sport

TECHNICAL_FEATURES: Analysis of the limitation of the natural vibration frequency, ensuring that it is not less than 8 Hz, and behaving appropriately in this aspect.
Dynamic analysis of the structure, with an ASCE 7 seismic spectrum, calculated with a 0.3sec acceleration.

INFO_TITLE_1: Un reconocimiento único para creadores, creadoras y comunidades
INFO_CONTENT_1_1: Los Premios ESLAND son una iniciativa privada promovida por el célebre streamer TheGrefg y buscan apoyar y reconocer la creación de contenido en el ámbito hispanohablante.
INFO_CONTENT_1_2: ESLAND es el acrónimo de ESPAÑA, LATINOAMÉRICA Y ANDORRA, tres localizaciones geográficas que comparten el idioma que las une más allá de cualquier frontera, ya sea física o virtual.
INFO_CONTENT_2_1: El trofeo que se entrega a los ganadores y ganadoras en la ceremonia es una representación de la letra “A” dividida en tres fragmentos y ensambladas a modo de artilugio futurista sobre el que se construye la narrativa del evento.
INFO_CONTENT_2_2: Un artefacto de origen desconocido que dota de herramientas y habilidades para la creación. Una metáfora sobre la emancipación del talento gracias a la tecnología y la irrupción de los creadores de contenido en el mundo del entretenimiento.
